channel.title: Problems Configuring Item to Correct Spot
channel.description:
[b]I am using GALKONS PRIDE CLIENT V3[/b]
When I equip any item it goes in weapon slot and equips wrong help?
POST AS MANY IDEAS AS POSSIBLE!!!!!!!!

item.title: Problems Configuring Item to Correct Spot
item.dc:creator: @mochronik mochronik
item.description:
@mochronik wrote:

simple.

#1 open item.java (in ur main folder)
#2 right at the top u should see somthing like

public static int amulets[] =

after the = there will be #s those are itemd IDS just add the ID # to that if its an ammy add it to amulets helm add to helms, etc…

Read full topic

item.source: Problems Configuring Item to Correct Spot

item.title: Problems Configuring Item to Correct Spot
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

This is server side, nothing to do with Galkon’s client.

In your server files, go to item.java, you will see an endless list of item id’s.

Alongside the id’s, normally indented nearer to the left, it will say, “Capes”, “Body”, etc.
Is what you need to do is add the item id of the item which is appearing in the wrong spot under one of these headers, separated with a comma.
Also, if you have an Item4.java, the exact same process explained above has to be repeated.

Read full topic
